items.value:
Crowbar
This piece of contraband is helpful for tearing down those pesky coin doors, one way doors
 and lockdown doors!

Thief Mask
Use this mask to make the Principal recognize you as a different person!
Until it wears off that is...

I.O.U
Use this throwable page on anything that requires an item,
 such as tape players, yellow doors, soda machines and more!
Be careful though... Principal doesn't like fraud...

Dealer Pouch
Who knows what is inside?
P.S: Stop reading this and deliver it!

Empty Dealer Pouch
Somehow, the contents magically vanished...
P.S: Nice try.

Pickaxe (3)
Dig new hallways and break down walls with this handy dandy pickaxe!

Pickaxe (2)
Dig new hallways and break down walls with this handy dandy pickaxe!

Pickaxe (1)
Dig new hallways and break down walls with this handy dandy pickaxe!
